hero.name: Prerna Reddy Ganga
hero.tagline: Graduate Student | Data Science and Applications

about.bio: Graduate student specializing in Data Science and Applications at the University at Buffalo. Passionate about building scalable data systems and practical AI/ML solutions.
highlights: Strong background in data engineering and analytics
Hands-on with machine learning and ETL pipelines

projects.title: Resume Match AI
projects.problem: Recruiters struggle to match resumes to job descriptions efficiently.
projects.approach: Built an LLM-based pipeline combining TF-IDF and reranker models.

projects.title: NYC Taxi ETL Pipeline
projects.problem: Analyzing large-scale taxi trip data requires scalable ETL.
projects.approach: Developed ETL pipelines using Airflow and PostgreSQL.
projects.outcome: Enabled efficient analytics with optimized schemas.

publications.title: Aero metamorphosis in Industry 6.0
publications.impact: Explores transformation of aerospace with Industry 6.0 principles.

publications.title: Diagnosis of Cystic Fibrosis Prognosis using Gradient Boosting
publications.impact: Applied machine learning to improve medical prognosis.
